install.name: JoomlaXTC Virtuemart Product Showcase Module

install.description: JoomlaXTC Virtuemart Product Showcase Module v2.6 - Visit www.joomlaxtc.com documents area for help.

param.name: parent_filter
param.label: Parents and Childs?
param.description: Type of products to display. If certain child product information is missing, such as thumbnail image, description, etc. it will be obtained from the parent product.

param.name: category_filter
param.label: Current category only?
param.description: Only show products from the category currently browsed by the customer.

param.name: manufacturer_filter
param.label: Current manufacturer only?
param.description: Only show products from the same manufacturer currently browsed by the customer.

param.name: special_filter
param.label: Special products only?
param.description: Restrict selection to products marked as Special only.

param.name: discount_filter
param.label: Discounted products only?
param.description: Restrict selection to products having a discount only.

param.name: image_filter
param.label: With image only?
param.description: Restrict selection to products having a full size image only.

param.name: date_filter
param.label: Availability filter
param.description: Restrict products based on their available date.

param.name: recentp_filter
param.label: Recent Products filter
param.description: Display products that are also on the user recently visited products list.

param.name: min_stock
param.label: Minimum stock
param.description: If specified, only products with equal or greater stock quantity are shown. A value of zero is required to show products out of stock and/or downloadable products. Use only numbers without comas.

param.name: min_rate
param.label: Minimum rate
param.description: Products having a rate below this value will not be shown. Select 'All products' to include unrated products.

param.name: min_price
param.label: Minimum price
param.description: If specified, only products with a price greater than this will be shown. Use only numbers without comas, spaces or dollar signs.

param.name: max_price
param.label: Maximum price
param.description: If specified, only products with a price less than this amount will be shown. Use only numbers without comas, spaces or dollar signs.

param.name: product_list
param.label: Product ID filter
param.description: Display a specific selection of products only. Selected products are shown in combination with Category and Manufacturer filters.

param.name: category_list
param.label: Category ID filter
param.description: Display products from specific categories only. Selected categories are shown in combination with Product and Manufacturer filters.

param.name: manufacturer_list
param.label: Manufacturer ID filter
param.description: Display products from specific manufacturers only. Selected manufacturers are shown in combination with Product and Category filters.

param.name: rows
param.label: Rows
param.description: When Table is selected: The Number of products per row.

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: Specifies the maximum number of items to be shown at one time on the module box. For example, you might want to set a number of 10 for a 'top ten' list. Please enter integer numbers with no punctuation.

param.name: pages
param.label: Pages
param.description: Number of product pages to display.

param.name: product_order
param.label: Product show order
param.description: Show products ordered randomly, by most recent, sales or available dates.

param.name: display_style
param.label: Display Style
param.description: Here you can decide wether the products are shown as a table or floating boxes. A table will always contain a set number of rows and columns, whereas the floating boxes fill the module block according to its size.

param.name: width
param.label: Window Width
param.description: Window width in pixels (only for Window mode).

param.name: height
param.label: Window Height
param.description: Window height in pixels (only for Window mode).

param.name: use_sectioncolor
param.label: Use colored rows?
param.description: When Table is selected: Alternate row colors using Joomla styles.

param.name: use_review
param.label: Include Reviews?
param.description: Include a review on each product (if available).

param.name: use_review_limit
param.label: Reviews to include
param.description: Maximum number of reviews to include.

param.name: use_review_template
param.label: Review Template code
param.description: HTML code for each review entry. Use {reviews} tag on module template to position.

param.name: htmlini
param.label: Template head code
param.description: HTML code used at the top of Showcase module.

param.name: html
param.label: Template product code
param.description: HTML code used to display each product.

param.name: htmlfin
param.label: Template foot code
param.description: HTML code used at the end of Showcase module.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Add-To-Cart button style
param.description: Select how to display 'Add-To-Cart' when {form_addtocart} tag appears on browse template.

param.name: addtocart_image
param.label: Add-to-Cart image filename
param.description: Image filename to show as Add-to-cart button. Will use VM default if none specified. Store your images on 'components/com_virtuemart/shop_image/ps_image' directory.

param.name: show_qty_box
param.label: Show Add-To-Cart quantity box?
param.description: Display a quantity box when {form_addtocart} tag appears on browse template. Position is relative to button.

param.name: default_qty
param.label: Default quantity
param.description: Default quantity for Add-to-cart button or box

param.name: date_format
param.label: Date format
param.description: Display format applied to date fields (if present). Uses same values as PHP 'date()' function, eg: default value of 'Y-m-d' will display like '2007-08-28'

param.name: image_width
param.label: Custom thumbnail width
param.description: Thumbnail width for automatic thumbnail creation (in pixels). Will use VM default if none specified.

param.name: image_height
param.label: Custom thumbnail height
param.description: Thumbnail height for automatic thumbnail creation (in pixels). Will use VM default if none specified.

param.name: product_class
param.label: CSS class name for product box
param.description: This CSS class will be assigned to each product box. Enter the class name only.

param.name: plugins
param.label: Enable mambots/Plugins?
param.description: Enable Joomla! mambots/plugins in the template and information shown.

param.name: desclen
param.label: Short description length
param.description: Maximum short description length (0 = no limit).

param.name: tabtitle
param.label: Tab prefix
param.description: Tab title prefix when using tab mode.

param.name: slidepause
param.label: Transition delay
param.description: Transition delay in milliseconds (default: 4000).

param.name: slidespeed
param.label: Transition duration
param.description: Transition duration in milliseconds (default: 1500).

param.name: slideflow
param.label: Slide orientation
param.description: Starting transition orientation of slide.

param.name: transition
param.label: Transition type
param.description: Transition animation type.

param.name: buttonpos
param.label: Buttons Position
param.description: Control buttons location.

param.name: pagebuttons
param.label: Show page buttons?
param.description: Display page number links.

param.name: button
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Button graphic set to use (if enabled).

param.label: Sliding Panel Settings
param.description: Sliding Panel

param.name: npslixin
param.label: Slide Panel X In
param.description: Slide X coordiantes px

param.name: npslixout
param.label: Slide Panel X out
param.description: Slide X coordiantes px

param.name: npsliyin
param.label: Slide Panel Y In
param.description: Slide Y coordiantes px

param.name: npsliyout
param.label: Slide Panel Y Out
param.description: Slide Y coordiantes px

param.name: npsliAnim
param.label: Slide animation mode
param.description: Slide Panel animation mode.
param.option: Makes the transition go back, then all forth

param.name: npsliEase
param.label: Slide ease mode
param.description: Slide ease mode.

param.name: npslidi
param.label: Frames Per Second
param.description: Frames per second

param.name: npslido
param.label: Frame Duration
param.description: Duration in Milliseconds.
